at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.ui

Class ConsoleUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.ui.ConsoleUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUI

    public class ConsoleUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUI
    A console based form of display, to check the current status of the different parts of the RMCS.
    Author:
    Boeck

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private UIText connectionText
      The object containing information about the status of the TCP-Connection with the server.
      private UIText gamepadControlText
      The object containing information about gamepad-input-data.
      private long lastPrinted
      The time at which the status of all topics was last printed.
      private UIText phoneControlText
      The object containing information about the received messages from a linked phone (through the server).
      private UIText sensorText
      The object containing information about sensor-data.

      Constructor and Description
      ConsoleUI() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void display()
      Displays the status of all topics, if it has not been displayed in the last 500ms.
      void update(EIdentifier identifier, java.lang.String text)
      Updates a specific topic(EIdentifier) of the UI with new information.

        public ConsoleUI()

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(EIdentifier identifier,
                   java.lang.String text)
        Updates a specific topic(EIdentifier) of the UI with new information. It also displays the new information after updating, if it has not been updated in the last 500ms.
        Specified by:
        update in interface IUI
        Parameters:
        identifier - the topic of the new information.
        text - the new information to be displayed.

      • display

        private void display()
        Displays the status of all topics, if it has not been displayed in the last 500ms.
